title: Praise the Orc! - Novel Updates

tags: Betrayal   Caring Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Elves   Famous Protagonist   Friendship   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Gods   Guilds   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Level System   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Modern Day   Monsters   Multiple POV   Orcs   R*pe   Sword And Magic   Time Skip   Virtual Reality   Wars   Weak to Strong   Younger Sisters
author: Lee Jungmin
description: Praise the Orc! is about Jung Ian, a cafe owner with a dark past, jumping into the world of virtual reality in order to protect his sister from any predators. However, things may not be as simple as he first believed them to be. Witness as he explores the lands of Elder Lord as an orc, a species labeled as the “game creator’s mistake”, defeating any and all before him!>
